1370: Mourin was born in Die Camp in 1370.
Got married to Lielde at age 25 in 1370.
1373: Had a daughter with Lielde, Lielde, at age 28.
1374: Had a son with Lielde, Pelegrim, at age 29.
1375: Had a daughter with Lielde, Folqui, at age 30.
1376: Had a son with Lielde, Macharius, at age 31.
1378: Had a son with Lielde, Godino, at age 33.
1379: Lost his wife Lielde while she was giving birth to Woltwigis in 1379.
Lost daughter Folqui when Folqui was 5 years old.
Lost daughter Woltwigis when Woltwigis was 1 years old.
1380: Lost son Pelegrim when Pelegrim was 7 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1386: Lost son Macharius when Macharius was 11 years old.
